message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60%, you take 40%.
I think we can do better than that. How about a 60/40 split, in my favor this time? It's a fair trade after all.

Let's split the money evenly this time. I understand you want more, but I don't think a 60/40 split is fair, especially with inflation affecting my share. A 50/50 split is the most logical way to move forward.
